name: Assassins Unleashed: The Apocalypse
description:
The Story

Welcome to Assassins Unleashed: The Apocalypse, the world has been thrown into a massive zombie apocalypse by a group called the Brotherhood of Night. To make matters worse the Cartel have taken this opportunity to use the dissent in the world to try and grow there power and fear, as an assassin of the Agency you can not allow this to happen, and must put an end to these groups once and for all.

Description

Assassins Unleashed: The Apocalypse is an in development mission assassination game, each level will have a set number of targets that will be given to you during the intro video for that mission, there are three types of missions that you will face inside of Assassins Unleashed: The Apocalypse, Assassination missions which are a small number of highly guarded targets that must be taken out, Purge Missions in which every enemy must be defeated in order to progress, and lastly Sniper Missions, these missions rely on speed and accuracy as you will be set in a high point and given your objectives to take out.

There are also however many advantages and disadvantages in each level, for example the Sandstone Citadel offers many buildings to go inside of and hold off enemies with, but in the streets there is no place to actually hide, however in the Rural Subdivision there are more bushes to hide in, as well as pipes on walls that you can climb allowing for you to get into a better vantage point and try and take out your opponents from afar.

Features Include

First Person Shooting Combat
Fast Paced Action
Mission system for selecting your targets
Complete flexibility over who you go after or what style of missions you play
Bushes can be used to hide in
Buildings in the Rural Subdivision can be climbed
Escape vehicles in the Assassination Missions
Variety in the missions and maps
